entry.title: Accepted paper at NeurIPS 2023
entry.content:
Our new work ‚ÄúProvably Efficient Offline Reinforcement Learning in Regular Decision Processes‚Äù has been accepted at NeurIPS!

Have a preview of this project from our last contribution at EWRL here: https://openreview.net/forum?id=fBaYBz8pUfk.

entry.title: Second MultiTTrust workshop
entry.content:
üì¢ MULTITTRUST 2.0 Workshop at HAI 2023

The 2nd International Workshop on Multidisciplinary Perspectives on Human-AI Team Trust.

https://multittrust.github.io/2ed/

üí° Topics: understanding and measuring trust in human-AI teams.

The call for papers is now open. Submit now and participate to the discussion!

More info in the website.
entry.summary: The call for contributions at the second MultiTTrust workshop is now open

entry.title: RLSS videos available
entry.content:
The videos of most lectures from the Reinforcement Learning Summer School 2023 are now available here!

This edition of the Reinforcement Learning Summer School has been in June 2023 in Barcelona, Spain. Me and some members of the AI-ML research group contributed to the organization of this event.

Special thanks to Matteo Papini and Vincent Adam for leading the organizing team.
entry.summary: The videos from the RL summer school are now available
